item.title: Romania President resigns after impeachment pressure over cancelled vote
item.description: His exit comes as political opponents had sought to remove him over remaining in office beyond the end of his term.

item.title: What to know about the Salman Rushdie stabbing trial
item.description: A 27-year-old man faces a jury trial in New York state, where Mr Rushdie is expected to testify.

item.title: South Africa law at centre of Trump row challenged in court
item.description: A junior partner in South Africa's governing coalition calls the new Expropriation Act unconstitutional.

item.title: Macron shares his deepfakes for AI summit attention
item.description: The French president posted a montage of parodies featuring himself to promote an AI Summit in Paris.

item.title: What are tariffs and why is Trump using them?
item.description: The cost of cars, fruit and pharmaceuticals could increase because of Trump's tariff announcement.
